theorem unfold_Goto: assumes chain_defined: "\<Gamma> chain = Some rs" and no_matching_Goto_rs: "no_matching_Goto \<gamma> p rs" shows "\<Gamma>,\<gamma>,p\<turnstile>\<^sub>g \<langle>(Rule m (Goto chain))#rest, s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> t \<longleftrightarrow> \<Gamma>,\<gamma>,p\<turnstile>\<^sub>g \<langle>add_match m rs @ add_match (MatchNot m) rest, s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> t"
